TopicTitle: Gold Stingray Inc. Spacecraft Division [New: Cygnus, Azure Kite, Azure Orca]

Articles.Content:
Hello Gold Stingray Inc.

I\'d like a VERY specific order please, an IL2 Sturmovik plane with MechJeb and Damned Aerospace mods, unless it hinders you alot.

Many thanks, Joshkb01
joskb01, your order has been filed and sent to an engineer.

Hey there. I have two planes I want to share, both that can fly really well and range as small and big. One can fly at excess 200m/s+, and the other one flies more slowly, great for short cruises and easy flight. Hope you all like!

Welcome to the corp!

Hello again

I\'m just wondering, who\'s making my IL2?

Many thanks, Joshkb01

@joshkb01: Your order has been filed to Engineer deadly654321, If there is an inconvenience with this engineer, please contact me and I will reassign the order.

Thanks!

Plaatinum_Spark

Thank you, I only wanted to know, it somewhat reassures me that they know what they\'re doing.

Many thanks, joshkb01

I present to you, the work in progress Ar \'\'Bighead\'\'

Very basic draft, though

@luigibro606: Can you add our recently joined employees's new spaceships to the front page? I'm working on the August showcase, but I need the new spaceships

Thanks!

Plaatinum_Spark

Yup, I'll be on it right now, will add as soon as I've used them ingame.

Also, work on the Stingray and Myliobar 0.16 varients is nearly finished; they're both two new models, although they still both have their distinctive look.

Edit again; @Cobbler; could you make an AR Bighead for 0.16?

Edit x3; Clicked save, 'You have more than five images in your message.' 'Canceling edit...'
